subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the UI component.

subMembers.name: animation
subMembers.description: Specifies the animation to be used to show the rendered content.

subMembers.name: renderWhen
subMembers.description: Specifies when the UI component content is rendered.

subMembers.name: showLoadIndicator
subMembers.description: Indicates if a load indicator should be shown until the UI component's content is rendered.

subMembers.name: staggerItemSelector
subMembers.description: Specifies a jQuery selector of items that should be rendered using a staggered animation.

properties.name: dxDeferRendering
properties.description: The DeferRendering is a UI component that waits for its content to be ready before rendering it. While the content is getting ready, the DeferRendering displays a loading indicator.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed when the content is rendered but not yet displayed.

Events.name: onShown
Events.description: A function that is executed when the content is displayed and animation is completed.

Events.name: rendered
Events.description: Raised when the content is rendered but not yet displayed.

Events.name: shown
Events.description: Raised when the content is displayed and animation is completed.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: RenderedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [rendered] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ShownEvent
Types.description: The type of the [shown] event handler's argument.
